titleStmt.title: By the Mayor to the aldermen of the ward of [blank] : whereas I have received a late order made by His Majesty in council : the tenor whereof is as followeth, that is to say : for the preventing tumultuous disorders which may happen hereafter upon pretence of assembling to make bonfires or publick fireworks ... it is this day ordered by His Majesty in council that no person or persons whatsoever do presume to make or encourage the making any bonfire or other publick fireworks ...
For the preventing tumultuous disorders which may happen hereafter upon pretence of assembling to make bonfires or publick fireworks
titleStmt.author: City of London (England). Lord Mayor.

notesStmt.note: This item appears at reel 1596:5 as Wing (2nd ed.) L2886C, and at reel 1745:15 as Wing (2nd ed.) L2886B.
Imperfect: copy at reel 1745:15 lacks lower part of sheet.
Reproduction of originals in the British Library, and Guildhall Library (London, England).
